verses.text: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w shortened|strong="H7114"\w*, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w*; \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w ear|strong="H8085"\w* \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w*, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*:

\w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* separated \w between|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* God, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w are|strong="H8193"\w* \w defiled|strong="H1351"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* fingers \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*; \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*, \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* muttereth \w wickedness|strong="H5766"\w*.

None sueth \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, \w and|strong="H5999"\w* none \w pleadeth|strong="H8199"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* truth: \w they|strong="H5921"\w* trust \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w vanity|strong="H7723"\w*, \w and|strong="H5999"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w lies|strong="H7723"\w*; \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w conceive|strong="H2029"\w* \w mischief|strong="H5999"\w*, \w and|strong="H5999"\w* \w bring|strong="H3205"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5999"\w*.

They \w hatch|strong="H1234"\w* \w adders|strong="H6848"\w*’ \w eggs|strong="H1000"\w*, \w and|strong="H4191"\w* weave \w the|strong="H4191"\w* spider’s \w web|strong="H6980"\w*: he \w that|strong="H4191"\w* eateth \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w their|strong="H4191"\w* \w eggs|strong="H1000"\w* \w dieth|strong="H4191"\w*; \w and|strong="H4191"\w* \w that|strong="H4191"\w* \w which|strong="H4191"\w* \w is|strong="H4191"\w* \w crushed|strong="H2116"\w* \w breaketh|strong="H2116"\w* \w out|strong="H1234"\w* into \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w viper|strong="H6848"\w*.

\w Their|strong="H1961"\w* \w webs|strong="H6980"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* garments, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* themselves \w with|strong="H3680"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w*: \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w* \w are|strong="H4639"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H3709"\w* iniquity, \w and|strong="H2555"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* \w act|strong="H6467"\w* \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*.

\w Their|strong="H8210"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w* \w to|strong="H7323"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w they|strong="H7323"\w* \w make|strong="H4116"\w* \w haste|strong="H4116"\w* \w to|strong="H7323"\w* \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*: \w their|strong="H8210"\w* \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w* \w are|strong="H4284"\w* \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w* \w of|strong="H1818"\w* iniquity; \w desolation|strong="H7701"\w* \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w* \w are|strong="H4284"\w* \w in|strong="H7272"\w* \w their|strong="H8210"\w* \w paths|strong="H4546"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*; \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w* \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w goings|strong="H4570"\w*: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w crooked|strong="H6140"\w* \w paths|strong="H5410"\w*; \w whosoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w goeth|strong="H1869"\w* therein \w doth|strong="H4941"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w doth|strong="H4941"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*: \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w look|strong="H2009"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* light, \w but|strong="H3808"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w brightness|strong="H5054"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w obscurity|strong="H2822"\w*.

\w We|strong="H4191"\w* \w grope|strong="H1659"\w* \w for|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* \w like|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*; yea, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w grope|strong="H1659"\w* \w as|strong="H5869"\w* they \w that|strong="H5869"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* no \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w stumble|strong="H3782"\w* \w at|strong="H4191"\w* \w noonday|strong="H6672"\w* \w as|strong="H5869"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w twilight|strong="H5399"\w*; among \w them|strong="H4191"\w* \w that|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* lusty \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w as|strong="H5869"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w men|strong="H5787"\w*.

\w We|strong="H3605"\w* \w roar|strong="H1993"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w like|strong="H1993"\w* \w bears|strong="H1677"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w moan|strong="H1897"\w* \w sore|strong="H1897"\w* \w like|strong="H1993"\w* \w doves|strong="H3123"\w*: \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w look|strong="H6960"\w* \w for|strong="H6960"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w there|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w none|strong="H3605"\w*; \w for|strong="H6960"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H7368"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w off|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* \w are|strong="H6588"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w thee|strong="H7235"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \w testify|strong="H6030"\w* \w against|strong="H5048"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* \w are|strong="H6588"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w them|strong="H6030"\w*:

\w transgressing|strong="H6586"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w denying|strong="H3584"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* turning \w away|strong="H5253"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* following \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w oppression|strong="H6233"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w revolt|strong="H5627"\w*, \w conceiving|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w uttering|strong="H1897"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w falsehood|strong="H8267"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4941"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w is|strong="H4941"\w* turned \w away|strong="H5253"\w* backward, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w standeth|strong="H5975"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w* \w off|strong="H7350"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w truth|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H4941"\w* \w fallen|strong="H3782"\w* \w in|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w street|strong="H7339"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w uprightness|strong="H5229"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w enter|strong="H5975"\w*.

\w Yea|strong="H3588"\w*, truth \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w lacking|strong="H5737"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w departeth|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w maketh|strong="H3068"\w* \w himself|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prey|strong="H7997"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w displeased|strong="H7489"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H7200"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H7200"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w no|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w wondered|strong="H8074"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H7200"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w no|strong="H7200"\w* \w intercessor|strong="H6293"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* own \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w brought|strong="H2220"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3467"\w* \w unto|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*; \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w upheld|strong="H5564"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w he|strong="H3444"\w* \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w on|strong="H3847"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* as \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w breastplate|strong="H8302"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w helmet|strong="H3553"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w upon|strong="H3847"\w* \w his|strong="H3847"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*; \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w he|strong="H3444"\w* \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w on|strong="H3847"\w* garments \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w* \w for|strong="H6666"\w* \w clothing|strong="H8516"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w was|strong="H7218"\w* \w clad|strong="H5844"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w zeal|strong="H7068"\w* as \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mantle|strong="H4598"\w*.

\w According|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w deeds|strong="H1578"\w*, accordingly \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H2534"\w* \w repay|strong="H7999"\w*, \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w*, \w recompense|strong="H1576"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*; \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* islands \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H2534"\w* \w repay|strong="H7999"\w* \w recompense|strong="H1576"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H5127"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w west|strong="H4628"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w from|strong="H5127"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w rising|strong="H4217"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* come \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w rushing|strong="H6862"\w* \w stream|strong="H5104"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w driveth|strong="H7307"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Redeemer|strong="H1350"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w unto|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w saith|strong="H6310"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*: \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w thee|strong="H7760"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w depart|strong="H4185"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*’s \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, \w saith|strong="H6310"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w henceforth|strong="H6258"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
